remarks: A cover is a refinement iff it is a subcover of something which is both finer and a refinement.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
statement:
refssfne.1 $e |- X = U. A $.
refssfne.2 $e |- Y = U. B $.
refssfne $p |- ( X = Y -> ( B Ref A <-> E. c ( B C_ c /\ ( A Fne c /\ c Ref A ) ) ) ) $.
$d A c $.
$d B c $.
$d X c $.
$d Y c $.
